DOC.detailed_description: In China , herbal formula use treatment diabetes century . Huangqisan , investigator name AMP-1915 , one traditional Chinese herbal formula use relieve diabetes record Shengji Zonglu ( General Medical Collection Royal Benevolence ) publish 1117 A.D. AMP-1915 consist three herb : Radix Astragali ( roots Astragalus membranaceus ( Fisch . ) Bge . var . mongholicus ( Bge . ) Hsiao , A ) , Mori Cortex radix ( root bark Morus alba L. , M ) Puerariae Lobatae Radix ( root Pueraria lobata ( Willd . ) Ohwi. , P ) . Recent study show three herbs constituent therapeutic effect metabolic disorder . This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial conduct community hospital Shanghai , China . 60 adult participant metabolic disorder patient accord least two impaired metabolic profile ( obesity , hyperglycemia , hyperlipidemia others ) . During 3-month treatment , participant randomly divide two group assign take AMP-1915 placebo . AMP-1915 placebo mixed instant noodle daily meal color , shape , size packaging . BMI , fast blood glucose ( FBG ) , triglyceride ( TG ) , total cholesterol ( TCH ) , high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDL-c ) , low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-c ) , insulin , HbA1c measure treatment .
